languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас поджимает губы.{/n} "После нападения ксеносов я бросил все силы на то, чтобы отыскать их по остывшим следам. Отдыхать не было времени, но... Мое тело в порядке. И не достойно забот Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ахиллеас поджимает губы.{/n} "После нападения ксеносов я бросил все силы на то, чтобы отыскать их по остывшим следам. Отдыхать не было времени, но... Мое тело в порядке. И не достойно забот Вашей Светлости".
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: {n}Achilleas presses his lips into a line.{/n} "Since the xenos attack, I have been working relentlessly to follow their cold trail. I have had no time for rest but... My body is functional. Its condition is beneath Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s notice."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас поджимает губы.{/n} "После нападения ксеносов я бросил все силы на то, чтобы отыскать их по остывшим следам. Отдыхать не было времени, но... Мое тело в порядке. И не достойно забот Вашей Светлости".

languages.text: {n}Achilleas pince les lèvres.{/n} « Depuis l'attaque des xénos, j'ai travaillé sans relâche pour suivre leur trace. Je n'ai pas eu le temps de me reposer, mais... mon corps est opérationnel. Son état n'est pas digne de l'intérêt de Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas presses his lips into a line.{/n} "Since the xenos attack, I have been working relentlessly to follow their cold trail. I have had no time for rest but... My body is functional. Its condition is beneath Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s notice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas pince les lèvres.{/n} « Après l'attaque des xénos, j'ai travaillé sans relâche pour suivre leur trace. Je n'ai pas eu le temps de me reposer, mais... mon corps est opérationnel. Son état n'est pas digne de l'intérêt de Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯抿紧了嘴唇。{/n}“自从那些异形袭击之后，我一直在坚持不懈地追踪他们的行踪。我并没有时间休息，不过……我的身体还能撑得住，您无需劳神关注我的身体状况。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas presses his lips into a line.{/n} "Since the xenos attack, I have been working relentlessly to follow their cold trail. I have had no time for rest but... My body is functional. Its condition is beneath Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s notice."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯抿紧了嘴唇。{/n}“那些异形袭击之后，我一直在坚持不懈地追踪他们的行踪。我并没有时间休息，不过……我的身体还能撑得住，您无需劳神关注我的身体状况。”
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは唇を押さえた。{/n}「異種族の襲撃のあと、私はひたすら彼らの冷たい足跡をたどってきました。休む暇はありませんでしたが…体は機能しています。陛下がお気になさる必要がありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas presses his lips into a line.{/n} "Since the xenos attack, I have been working relentlessly to follow their cold trail. I have had no time for rest but... My body is functional. Its condition is beneath Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s notice."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは唇を押さえた。{/n}「異種族の襲撃のあと、私はひたすら彼らの冷たい足跡をたどってきました。休む暇はありませんでしたが…体は機能しています。陛下がお気になさる必要がありません」
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: {n}Achilleas presst seine Lippen zusammen.{/n} "Seit dem Xenos-Angriff habe ich mich unermüdlich darum bemüht, ihrer kalten Spur zu folgen. Ich hatte bisher keine Zeit, um mich auszuruhen, aber ... Mein Körper ist funktionsfähig. Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} braucht mich nicht zu beachten."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas presses his lips into a line.{/n} "Since the xenos attack, I have been working relentlessly to follow their cold trail. I have had no time for rest but... My body is functional. Its condition is beneath Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s notice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas presst seine Lippen zusammen.{/n} "Nach dem Xenos-Angriff habe ich mich unermüdlich darum bemüht, ihrer kalten Spur zu folgen. Ich hatte bisher keine Zeit, um mich auszuruhen, aber ... Mein Körper ist funktionsfähig. Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} braucht mich nicht zu beachten."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: {n}Achilleas aprieta los labios.{/n} «Después del ataque de los xenos, he estado trabajando infatigablemente para seguir el rastro antes de que se enfriase. No he tenido tiempo de descansar, pero... Mi cuerpo aún responde. No ha de preocuparse usted por mi estado de salud, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas presses his lips into a line.{/n} "Since the xenos attack, I have been working relentlessly to follow their cold trail. I have had no time for rest but... My body is functional. Its condition is beneath Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s notice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas aprieta los labios.{/n} «Después del ataque de los xenos, he estado trabajando infatigablemente para seguir el rastro antes de que se enfriase. No he tenido tiempo de descansar, pero... Mi cuerpo aún responde. No ha de preocuparse usted por mi estado de salud, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr

languages.text: {n}Achilleas, dudaklarını birbirine bastırıyor.{/n} "Zenoların saldırıları sonrası geride bıraktıkları az miktarda izi sürmek için canla başla çalışıyorum. Dinlenecek zamanım olmadı ama bedenim işlevsel durumda. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin sağlığım hususunda endişelenmesine gerek yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas presses his lips into a line.{/n} "Since the xenos attack, I have been working relentlessly to follow their cold trail. I have had no time for rest but... My body is functional. Its condition is beneath Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s notice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas dudaklarını birbirine bastırıyor.{/n} "Zenoların saldırıları sonrası geride bıraktıkları az miktarda izi sürmek için canla başla çalışıyorum. Dinlenecek zamanım olmadı ama bedenim işlevsel durumda. Sağlık durumum konusunda {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin endişelenmesine gerek yok."
traits.speaker: AhileasSkalandr
